readme: # fake-image snippets for Atom [![apm](https://img.shields.io/apm/dm/fake-image-snippets.svg?style=flat-square)](https://atom.io/packages/fake-image-snippets) This is snippets for set `` placeholder with [fakeimg](https://fakeimg.pl/) quickly. ## Install Search `fake-image-snippets` on package manager or `apm install fake-image-snippets` ## Usage ![FakeImg Usage](./fakeimg.gif) ## Documentation There support two snippets now: - `fakeImg`: Add normal fakeimg.pl link on placeholder, ex: `` - `fakeImgS`: Add square image by default, ex: `` - `sfakeImgS`: Just add url, ex: `http://fakeimg.pl/200x200/000000,128/000` This snippet tabs through some options (default): - horizontal size 350 - vertical size 200 - background color bdd9d2 - text color 3f232a - sample text Fake-Imag following are other options you can set: - `font=lobster` - `font_size=14` - `retina=1` More detail you can see [fakeimg](https://fakeimg.pl/) ## Example `` ![Example image](http://fakeimg.pl/350x200/bdd9d2/3f232a/?text=Fake-Image) ## Contributing - Fork it! - Create your feature branch: `git checkout -b my-new-feature` - Commit your changes: `git commit -m 'Add some feature'` - Push to the branch: `git push origin my-new-feature` - Submit a pull request
